title.value: Test resource record super-type with minimal MAGIC Discovery Profile properties

identification.abstract:
An example product to verify resource super-type records with the minimal set of properties required by the MAGIC Discovery Profile is handled correctly.

This record does not include a publication date to test the 'false' branch of the released date conditional schema.
